subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Rays’ left fielder, Carl Crawford, who is probably the fastest player in baseball, has solidified his position as the best base-stealer with a major league-best 20 in 20 attempts.
snippet: The Tampa Bay Rays’ left fielder, Carl Crawford, who is probably the fastest player in baseball, has solidified his position as the best base-stealer with a major league-best 20 in 20 attempts.
